EmailTemplate.name: Bad Timing Nurture - Day 100
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, curious how Luxury Presence can help?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you're doing well! As a busy real estate agent, you know that a strong online presence is essential in today's competitive market.
We've been working with some of the top agents and teams in the industry, and we'd love to show you what we can do to take your business to the next level.
Whether you're looking to refresh your website, create digital CMAs, or run paid ads, we have the expertise and resources to help you stand out from the competition.
Don't just take our word for itâ€”check out our case studies to see how we've helped other agents like you achieve their business goals.
Let's hop on a call and discuss how we can help you build your brand and win more business. Book a time on my calendar that works for you, and let's get started.
Best, {!User.Name}
